  • WE DID
  • WE ARE
LAUNCH PROJECT
Python

Our core technology is Python language and we feel ourselves as a part of it's great community. Using Django and REST frameworks we achieve great results in speed and reliability of our web services. Thanks to pypy interpreter we simultaneously achieve high performance and code beauty in pythonic way

Postgres

Thanks to Postgres advanced RDBS, we could provide our customers reliable rock solid database as a part of our solutions. This database got a lot of advanced features and compete with commercial databases like Oracle. Postgres easily integrates into most popular server side frameworks.

Amazon web services

Amazon cloud computing services allow us and our customers to build robust and scalable web applications for millions of users. The most complete set of infrastructure services inside AWS allow us to focus on features development while all aspects of infrastructure maintenance solved by AWS. We love elastic beans talk service, which allow us to build dynamically scalable web services with close to zero effort in development process.

Java

Our second favorite language is Java, still one of the most popular language in enterprise market. We believe that Spring Framework and Apache Camel, could allow to build any type of application, starting from simple web server up to cmoplete complex enterprise applications.

Angular

We live in a highly competitive world of Internet era, where each small pixel plays a role to win users attention. Web applications front ends are faces of project and we spent a huge amount of time to collect competency in myriads of frontend frameworks. We give the first place to Angular JS as open-source web application framework to address many of the challenges encountered in developing single-page applications. It aims to simplify both the development and the testing of such applications by providing a framework for client-side model-view-controller (MVC) and model-view-viewmodel (MVVM) architectures, along with components commonly used in rich Internet applications.

Android

Amazon cloud computing services allow us and our customers to build robust and scalable web applications for millions of users. The most complete set of infrastructure services inside AWS allow us to focus on features development while all aspects of infrastructure maintenance solved by AWS. We love elastic beans talk service, which allow us to build dynamically scalable web services with close to zero effort in development process.

Ios

It is the second most popular mobile operating system in the world by sales, after Android. Focused on premium users segment, iOS apps reach users with highest purchasing power. We develop beautiful native iOS applications to let you achieve the maximum of your monetization goals.
